name: Squad Heist
description:
Your mission - if you choose to accept it - is to steal a diamond from a museum! You can switch between three different characters with different traits.

How does the game fit the theme?

By combinig the strenghts of the different characters you are stronger as a team.

Did you write all the code yourself and made all the assets from scratch?

All the code is written form scratch and all assets are made by us. The music is credit to www.bensound.com.
